long_description: The powerful Light & Motion Urban 700 bike light pumps out a bright 700 lumens of light for bike commutes and leisure rides and recharges via USB cable for convenience. Amber side lights enhance visibility while biking alongside cars. Run times range from 1.5 hrs. on high to 6 hrs. on low; get up to 12 hrs. of use in flash mode. Integrated lithium ion battery charges via USB in 5 hrs.; charge indicator displays the charge status so you know when to recharge. The Light & Motion Urban 700 bike light is designed to be mounted on your handlebar (fits most handlebars); mounting bracket included.
short_description: The powerful Light & Motion Urban 700 bike light pumps out a bright 700 lumens of light for bike commutes and leisure rides and recharges via USB cable for convenience.
